name: vscode-autohotkey-plus-plus
description: AutoHotkey v1 and v2 language support for Visual Studio Code: IntelliSense, debugging, formatting, and more!

scripts.build: npm run compile:grammar && node src/build.mjs --mode=production && cd ahk2 && npm run build
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile:grammar && node src/build.mjs && cd ahk2 && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:language && npm run clean:out
scripts.compile:grammar: js-yaml language/ahk.tmLanguage.yaml > language/ahk.tmLanguage.json && js-yaml language/ahk2.tmLanguage.yaml > language/ahk2.tmLanguage.json && js-yaml language/ahk2-output.tmLanguage.yaml > language/ahk2-output.tmLanguage.json
scripts.lint: npm run format && npm run eslint && npm run sort-package-json
scripts.lint:fix: npm run format:fix && npm run eslint:fix && npm run sort-package-json:fix
scripts.prepare: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd ahk2 && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:grammar && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:grammar && npm run test:unit:ci && npm run test:e2e:ci
scripts.pretest:e2e: npm run build && npm run compile:ts
scripts.validate: npm run format && npm run test && npm run package
scripts.validate:ci: npm run lint && npm run test:ci && npm run package
scripts.validate:deep: cd ahk2 && npm run validate && cd .. && npm run validate
scripts.validate:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run test && npm run package
scripts.validate:test:e2e: npm run test:e2e && npm run package

program.description: Absolute path to the AHK v1 script to debug.

trace.description: Enable logging of the Debug Adapter Protocol.

max_children.description: Max number of array or object children to initially retrieve.

max_data.description: Max amount of variable data to initially retrieve.

program.description: Absolute path to the AHK v2 script to debug.

trace.description: Enable logging of the Debug Adapter Protocol.

max_children.description: Max number of array or object children to initially retrieve.

max_data.description: Max amount of variable data to initially retrieve.
